channel.title: Funding on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Funding on ZAP

item.title: ZAP Has Joined Forces With Checkmarx
item.description: This is a huge investment (and vote of confidence) in ZAP and will secure the projectâ€™s future success.

item.title: Should ZAP Switch to a Non-OSI Approved Licence?
item.description: Yes, we are still struggling to find a way to make ZAP development sustainable.

item.title: ZAP Professional Services!
item.description: ZAP Professional Services are now available, delivered by key members of the ZAP Core Team. Money raised from these services will help fund ZAP development.

item.title: Support Changes
item.description: Changes that we are having to put in place regarding ZAP support.

item.title: ZAP Funding and the Open Source Fellowship
item.description: ZAP is now supported by the Crash Override Open Source Fellowship!

item.title: ZAP Professional Services?
item.description: Would you be interested in ZAP based professional services? If so please get in touch.

item.title: How Should We Fund ZAP Development?
item.description: We would love to be able to make ZAP even better for you - your feedback on how that could be funded would be appreciated!
